friend constexpr bool operator==( const /*inner-iterator*/&amp; x,

Compares the {{rlp|/|iterator}} and the [[cpp/iterator/default_sentinel_t|sentinel]].

Let {{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}} be the underlying pointer to enclosing {{tt|chunk_view}}.

Equivalent to: {{c|1=returns x.parent_-&gt;remainder_ == 0;}}

{{par|x|{{rlp|/|iterator}} to compare}}
